page.title: 05HOME LIFE IN EGERTON
page.content: The majority of homes are well cared for, with well stocked gardens to front and rear, and contain most modern amenities. Homes are usually 3 or 4 bedroomed, have a lounge, dining room, kitchen, bathroom with shower, 1 or 2 toilets, and a garage. Some have studies. The home will be carpeted from wall to wall. The lounge will be used most and will contain a three piece suite, book and ornament units; T.V.,Video, and Hi-Fi equipment for entertainment.Kitchens will be fully fitted with storage units, and will house a fridge, freezer, cooker, washer, dish washer and electrical cooking aids.Bedrooms, usually one per person will have fitted wardrobes, and will also serve as studies or playrooms.There will be central heating, usually gas fired.
